name: Plasma Slayer
description:
You must survive in an arena against machines with only your trusty plasma gun and agility. Your plasma gun can fire an endless stream of plasma bolts, or fire a cluster of homing rockets. As you damage the machines your gun gains power, but be careful; one hit from them and you die. 

WASD: Movement

Space: Jump

Left Click: Fire bolts

Right Click: Fire rockets

Esc: Quit to menu
